**2025-10-29 / @aclements, @adonovan, @bradfitz, @griesemer, @neild, @rolandshoemaker**

**Accepted**

- **bytes: add Buffer.Peek** [#73794](https://go.dev/issue/73794)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **crypto: remove in Go 1.27 GODEBUGs introduced in Go 1.23 and earlier** [#75316](https://go.dev/issue/75316)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- none

**Likely Decline**

- none

**Active**

- **all: add bare metal support** [#73608](https://go.dev/issue/73608)
  - discussion ongoing
- **cmd/vet: add check for using %q with integer types** [#72850](https://go.dev/issue/72850)
  - added to minutes
- **container/hash: Map, a generic hash table with custom hash function and equivalence relation** [#69559](https://go.dev/issue/69559)
  - discussion ongoing
- **crypto/fips140: add Version** [#75301](https://go.dev/issue/75301)
  - commented
- **crypto/x509: document that Certificate methods are only valid for results of ParseCertificate** [#75679](https://go.dev/issue/75679)
  - discussion ongoing
- **debug/pe: add BigObj COFF support via new fields on File struct** [#75659](https://go.dev/issue/75659)
  - discussion ongoing
- **go/ast: add BasicLit.ValueEnd field** [#76031](https://go.dev/issue/76031)
  - added to minutes
- **go/token: add File.End method** [#75849](https://go.dev/issue/75849)
  - added to minutes
- **must: Do** [#54297](https://go.dev/issue/54297)
  - discussion ongoing
- **runtime/mainthread: add mainthread.Do for mediating access to the main thread** [#70089](https://go.dev/issue/70089)
  - commented
- **spec: direct reference to embedded fields in struct literals** [#9859](https://go.dev/issue/9859)
  - discussion ongoing
- **x/net/http2: add support for RFC 9218 priorities** [#75500](https://go.dev/issue/75500)
  - discussion ongoing

- **cmd/{go,cgo,compile}: change interpretation of relative //line directives** [#70478](https://go.dev/issue/70478)
  - hold for implementation
- **crypto/tls: dynamically reload root certificate authorities** [#64796](https://go.dev/issue/64796)
  - put on hold
- **debug/bisect: publish x/tools/internal/bisect** [#67140](https://go.dev/issue/67140)
  - hold for @rsc
- **encoding/{base32,base64}: constant-time implementations of RFC 4648 codecs for use with cryptography keys** [#73901](https://go.dev/issue/73901)
  - hold for implementation
- **os: convenience function for one-off Root operations** [#73168](https://go.dev/issue/73168)
  - put on hold
- **regexp: add iterator forms of matching methods** [#61902](https://go.dev/issue/61902)
  - hold for @rsc
